languages.text: "Какого рода {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}жертвы{/d} вы приносили ксеноаномалии, принявшей формы бездонной пропасти и являвшей вам свои богохульные видения? Или вы предполагали, что это тоже тайна?"

"What manner of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}sacrifices{/d} did you offer to the xeno-anomaly that had taken on the form of a bottomless pit and revealed to you its blasphemous visions? Or did you think that was a secret as well?"
languages.original_text: "Какого рода {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}жертвы{/d} вы приносили ксеноаномалии, принявшей формы бездонной пропасти и являвшей вам свои богохульные видения? Или вы предполагали, что это тоже тайна?"

traits.locale_text: "What manner of sacrifices did you offer to the xeno-anomaly that had taken on the form of a bottomless pit and revealed to you its blasphemous visions? Or did you think this was a secret as well?"
"What manner of sacrifices did you offer to the xeno-anomaly that had taken on the form of a bottomless pit and revealed to you its blasphemous visions? Or did you think this was a secret as well?"
"What manner of sacrifices did you offer to the xeno-anomaly that had taken on the form of a bottomless pit and revealed to you its blasphemous visions? Or did you think that was a secret as well?"

"What manner of sacrifices did you offer to the xeno-anomaly that had taken on the form of a bottomless pit and revealed to you its blasphemous visions? Or did you think that was a secret as well?"

languages.text: 「異種族の例外にどんな{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}犠牲{/d}を払ったのだ？奴らは底なしの穴となったこともあれば、お前に不敬な展望を語ったこともあるはずだが？それとも、これも秘匿するつもりか？」
languages.original_text: "What manner of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}sacrifices{/d} did you offer to the xeno-anomaly that had taken on the form of a bottomless pit and revealed to you its blasphemous visions? Or did you think that was a secret as well?"

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の例外にどんな犠牲を払ったのだ？奴らは底なしの穴となったこともあれば、お前に不敬な展望を語ったこともあるはずだが？それとも、これも秘匿するつもりか？」

languages.original_text: "What manner of sacrifices did you offer to the xeno-anomaly that had taken on the form of a bottomless pit and revealed to you its blasphemous visions? Or did you think that was a secret as well?"

languages.text: “那个幻化成无底洞的异形幻象，向你展示了它亵渎神明的幻景，而你向它{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}献祭{/d}了什么？还是说，这也是你的秘密？”
languages.original_text: "What manner of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}sacrifices{/d} did you offer to the xeno-anomaly that had taken on the form of a bottomless pit and revealed to you its blasphemous visions? Or did you think that was a secret as well?"

traits.locale_text: “那个幻化成无底洞的异形幻象，向你展示了它亵渎神明的幻景，而你向它献祭了什么？还是说，这也是你的秘密？”

languages.text: «¿Qué clase de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}sacrificios{/d} ofreció a la xenoanomalía que había adoptado la forma de un pozo sin fondo y le reveló visiones blasfemas? ¿O también pensaba que eso era secreto?».
languages.original_text: "What manner of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}sacrifices{/d} did you offer to the xeno-anomaly that had taken on the form of a bottomless pit and revealed to you its blasphemous visions? Or did you think that was a secret as well?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué clase de sacrificios ofreció a la xenoanomalía que había adoptado la forma de un pozo sin fondo y le reveló visiones blasfemas? ¿O también pensaba que eso era secreto?».

languages.text: « Quels {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}sacrifices{/d} avez-vous bien pu offrir à la xéno-anomalie en forme de puits sans fond qui vous a révélé des visions blasphématoires ? Ou peut-être espériez-vous que ce soit également un secret ? »
languages.original_text: "What manner of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}sacrifices{/d} did you offer to the xeno-anomaly that had taken on the form of a bottomless pit and revealed to you its blasphemous visions? Or did you think that was a secret as well?"

traits.locale_text: « Quels sacrifices avez-vous bien pu offrir à la xéno-anomalie en forme de puits sans fond qui vous a révélé des visions blasphématoires ? Ou peut-être espériez-vous que ce soit également un secret ? »

languages.text: "Was für {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}Opfer{/d} habt Ihr der Xeno-Anomalie angeboten, die die Form eines bodenlosen Lochs angenommen und Euch ihre blasphemischen Visionen enthüllt hatte? Oder hieltet Ihr das auch für ein Geheimnis?"
languages.original_text: "What manner of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}sacrifices{/d} did you offer to the xeno-anomaly that had taken on the form of a bottomless pit and revealed to you its blasphemous visions? Or did you think that was a secret as well?"

traits.locale_text: "Was für Opfer habt Ihr der Xeno-Anomalie angeboten, die die Form eines bodenlosen Lochs angenommen und Euch ihre blasphemischen Visionen enthüllt hatte? Oder hieltet Ihr das auch für ein Geheimnis?"

languages.text: "Dipsiz bir çukur biçimini alan ve sana kâfirce görüler gösteren zeno anomalisi için neler {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}kurban etmeyi{/d} teklif ettin? Yoksa onun da mı bir sır olduğunu düşünüyordun?"
languages.original_text: "What manner of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_BottomlessPitDarkness}sacrifices{/d} did you offer to the xeno-anomaly that had taken on the form of a bottomless pit and revealed to you its blasphemous visions? Or did you think that was a secret as well?"

traits.locale_text: "Dipsiz bir çukur biçimini alan ve sana kâfirce görüler gösteren zeno anomalisi için neler kurban etmeyi teklif ettin? Yoksa onun da mı bir sır olduğunu düşünüyordun?"
"Dipsiz bir çukur biçimini alan ve sana kâfirce görüler gösteren zeno anomalisi için neler kurban etmeyi teklif ettin? Yoksa onun da mı bir sır olduğunu düşünüyordun?"
